Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: David N. Chambers
Reviews.Content: Did as much homework as I could stand before purchasing this camera.  I am still learning the ropes (first non-point and shoot) but loves it.  Was choosing between D3200 and Canon T3i and other than diehard canon fans the nikon won on most features.  One exception was articulating screen.  Otherwise the Nikon outstrips to Canon.  Love the Sigma lens, but haven't played much with the Nikon kit lens yet.  Couldn't be more happy with my choice now to learn how to use it.

Reviews.Title: Great Bundle
Reviews.Author: Ron T.
Reviews.Content: Just got this in the other day. Already reviewed the accompanying DVD and it helped the amateur immensely. My only recommendation would be to swap out the 50-inch tripod with a sturdier one.  Once I placed the D3200 with Sigma Lens on the 50-inch, it was a bit wobbly for the weight it was holding. Other than that one small issue, this is a great way to get into DSLR photography. Thanks Photo4Less.

Reviews.Title: There is not a better package with better service...
Reviews.Author: Steve
Reviews.Content: I must admit, when camera shopping, there were many tempting options.  Of course, we were working with a tight budget.  After reviewing cameras online, and with little exposure to DSLR brands (outside of Canon), we settled on the Nikon D3200.  The reviews were the best for the entry-level DSLR camera on a budget.  Then, there was the hunt...  Best Buy offered a package with an extra, higher powered lens and carrying case.  Awesome, but then there was THIS package.  Seems too good to be true: multiple lenses, filters, manuals and instruction videos, tripod, table-top tripod, carrying bag, and the camera (battery, strap, lens).  The package finally arrived, and it is EXACTLY what is listed.  There are no variations from the picture or from the description.  You cannot find a better package deal than what PHOTO4LESS has to offer.As a part of that package, you also get THE BEST customer service I have EVER seen or interacted with.  UPS tried their damnedest to screw up the delivery by attempting delivery when we were not at home.  Because the seller takes each customer and shipment seriously, they require a signature at time of delivery to make sure no wandering soul swipes the expensive box.  I had to place a call to customer service at PHOTO4LESS to allow the package to be released by UPS (We needed the package for a trip).  The customer service was courteous, fast, and thorough.  The phone rang once, and it was answered BY A HUMAN.  The heavy, kind and helpful Brooklyn accent transferred me to the correct department, on the first try, and I spoke with ANOTHER HUMAN.  The problem was solved [Leave it to UPS to not call me back when they said they were going to, but that is UPS.  PHOTO4LESS did an exquisite job!].I am confident in saying that the lovely people at PHOTO4LESS in Brooklyn, NY have the best service with the best camera package offerings available at the best prices.  We WILL use PHOTO4LESS again for more camera purchases, and you cannot beat the Nikon D3200 package they have to offer.  I gave them five stars for the camera package offered and services provided, and they deserve every one of them.

Reviews.Title: Wow
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: This an amazing package!  All the extras that come with this camera are pretty cool.  The camera itself is beautiful.  I would definitely recommend this package deal to everyone.  I'm so excited to use my new camera!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Great deal good starter kit
Reviews.Author: rob
Reviews.Content: Great camera so far! I was torn between choosing a rebel or nikon for the longest time, then I found this deal and couldn't pass it up! Very happy

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: John Rivera
Reviews.Content: I love everything about it but the tripod and the flash where not very good everything else is good and high quality

Reviews.Title: Enjoy your Awesome photos!!
Reviews.Author: blondi1x4
Reviews.Content: I love this camera takes great pictures and came with everything shown in the picture.. The Tripods are not very strong and durable is the only problem i found but this was such a great deal im not worried anout those.

Reviews.Title: Super deal! Super Price
Reviews.Author: Tim
Reviews.Content: Got this for my son who loves photography and what a deal!  For about the same price I paid for a case, camera, card and extra lens for my daughter a couple of years ago, I got so much more and a better quality camera.  Shipping was fast and it arrived on my son's birthday.  I highly recommend the seller and the product

Reviews.Title: Great bundle, get company!
Reviews.Author: KD060982
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing package and the price can't be beat! This company also provided prompt customer service, answering my email within 15 mins! I can't wait to get home from work just to play with this! :)

Reviews.Title: I need the menu in spanish, the language is in English and Chinese
Reviews.Author: leonidas
Reviews.Content: I can send the file to update the menu of the camera, with the Spanish languagethank you very muchbest regards

Reviews.Title: nikon D3200
Reviews.Author: Kenneth
Reviews.Content: I got it, used it right out the Box,  GREAT!!!  Love it I move up from A point and shoot . GREAT YOU GOT TO GET ONE.Kenny from NYC

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: kmdeppa
Reviews.Content: This camera is amazing. The picture quality tops any camera that I have ever had before. I am still working on learning all the settings on the camera being that there are a lot of them, but loving everything about it. I would highly recommend this camera to anyone looking to buy a SLR. I couldn't believe how many extras came with the camera, worth every penny spent on this bundle.

Reviews.Title: Love it!
Reviews.Author: stylus
Reviews.Content: I love this camera , still working on figuring it all out, but love it.  I am looking forward to some awesome pictures, once I learn all about it.

Reviews.Title: My new Nikon
Reviews.Author: Jenny L Ellis
Reviews.Content: I love this camera. Can't wait to get out there and start taking lots of pics with it! Thankyou very much

ProductInfo.Features:
This Photo4Less Top Value Camera And Accessories Kit includes
Nikon D3200 Digital SLR Camera Body - Nikon 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6G AF-S DX VR Nikkor Zoom Lens - Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 DG Macro Autofocus Lens (with built-in motor) for Nikon AF
Transcend 16GB Class 10 SDHC Card - Transcend 8 GB Class 10 SDHC Flash Memory Card -58mm Ultraviolet UV Protector Filter - 6 FT HDMI to mini HDMI Type C Cable, HDMI 1.3, DV, HDTV - Nikon School DVD Better Pictures In 5 Minutes
Digital DSLR Auto Power Slave Flash LCD Screen Protectors (Clear) - Table Top Tripod - 52mm 2X Professional Telephoto Lens - 50" Photo Video Quality Tripod - 3 Piece Filter Kit (UV-CPL-FLD) 52mm - High Definition 52mm Wide Angle Lens
Water Resistant Shock Proof Camcorder & SLR Camera Case - Lens Cap Holder - Camera & Lens 3 Piece Cleaning Kit - Tri-fold Memory Card Wallet - ML-L3 Wireless Remote Control
ProductInfo.Name: Nikon D3200 24.2 MP Cmos Digital SLR with 18-55mm F/3.5-5.6 Af-s Dx Vr Nikkor Zoom Lens + Sigma 70-300mm f/4-5.6 SLD DG Macro Lens with built in motor Lens + 52mm 2x Professional Lens +High Definition 52mm Wide Angle Lens + Auto Flash + Uv Filter Kit with 24GB Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle
